name: Bloody Jump
description:
Jump, jump and jump again! Collect all the coins and run to the gate! But be careful, because you are only one jump away from death.

This is my first game that I have decided to share with the world. You will get access to a demo version containing one level for free. If you want more, please support me with a small donation.

In return, I will give you access to the full version containing five levels. Thanks to this, you will also give me the motivation to work on my next project (racing game in the style of Micro Machines).

Have fun!
